summary: A woman, unhappily married to a cheating executive, starts meeting her dead mother's lover and gets thrown into a romantic dilemma after succumbing to a rough laborer.
cast: Mariko Okada|Yoshie Minami|Tadahiko Sugano|Shigako Shimegi|Isao Kimura|Etsushi Takahashi|Tôru Emori|Katsumi Nezu|Takehiko Ono|Akira Wakabayashi|Kiwako Ôike
title: Jôen
